properties.description: @{workbookKey=DigitalGuardianWorkbook; logoFileName=Azure_Sentinel.svg; description=Sets the time name for analysis; dataTypesDependencies=System.Object[]; dataConnectorsDependencies=System.Object[]; previewImagesFileNames=System.Object[]; version=1.0.0; title=DigitalGuardianDLP; templateRelativePath=DigitalGuardian.json; subtitle=; provider=Digital Guardian}.description
Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Analytics Rule 1 with template
properties.displayName: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Analytics Rule template

properties.description: DigitalGuardianClassifiedDataInsecureTransfer_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 2.0.1
Detects sensitive data transfer over insecure channel.
properties.displayName: Digital Guardian - Sensitive data transfer over insecure channel
properties.query:
DigitalGuardianDLPEvent
| where isnotempty(MatchedPolicies)
| where isnotempty(inspected_document)
| where NetworkApplicationProtocol =~ 'HTTP'
| extend AccountCustomEntity = SrcUserName, IPCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr

properties.description: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Analytics Rule 1
Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Analytics Rule 2 with template
properties.displayName: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Analytics Rule template

properties.description: DigitalGuardianExfiltrationOverDNS_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 2.0.1
Detects exfiltration using DNS protocol.
properties.displayName: Digital Guardian - Exfiltration using DNS protocol
properties.query:
DigitalGuardianDLPEvent
| where DstPortNumber == 53
| extend AccountCustomEntity = SrcUserName

properties.description: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Analytics Rule 2
Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Analytics Rule 3 with template
properties.displayName: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Analytics Rule template

properties.description: DigitalGuardianExfiltrationToFileShareServices_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 2.0.1
Detects exfiltration to online fileshare.
properties.displayName: Digital Guardian - Exfiltration to online fileshare
properties.query:
let threshold = 10;
DigitalGuardianDLPEvent
| where isnotempty(inspected_document)
| where http_url contains 'dropbox' or http_url contains 'mega.nz'
| summarize f = dcount(inspected_document) by SrcUserName, bin(TimeGenerated, 30m)
| where f >= threshold
| extend AccountCustomEntity = SrcUserName

properties.description: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Analytics Rule 3
Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Analytics Rule 4 with template
properties.displayName: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Analytics Rule template

properties.description: DigitalGuardianFileSentToExternal_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 2.0.1
Detects exfiltration to private email.
properties.displayName: Digital Guardian - Exfiltration to private email
properties.query:
DigitalGuardianDLPEvent
| where NetworkApplicationProtocol =~ 'SMTP'
| where isnotempty(inspected_document)
| extend s_user = substring(SrcUserName, 0, indexof(SrcUserName, '@'))
| extend d_user = substring(DstUserName, 0, indexof(DstUserName, '@'))
| extend s_domain = extract(@'@(.*)', 1, SrcUserName)
| extend d_domain = extract(@'@(.*)', 1, DstUserName)
| where s_domain != d_domain
| where s_user == d_user
| extend AccountCustomEntity = SrcUserName

properties.description: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Analytics Rule 4
Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Analytics Rule 5 with template
properties.displayName: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Analytics Rule template

properties.description: DigitalGuardianFileSentToExternalDomain_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 2.0.1
Detects exfiltration to external domain.
properties.displayName: Digital Guardian - Exfiltration to external domain
properties.query:
let corp_domain = dynamic(['example.com']);     //add all corporate domains to this list
DigitalGuardianDLPEvent
| where NetworkApplicationProtocol =~ 'SMTP'
| where isnotempty(inspected_document)
| extend s_domain = extract(@'@(.*)', 1, SrcUserName)
| extend d_domain = extract(@'@(.*)', 1, DstUserName)
| where s_domain in~ (corp_domain)
| where d_domain !in (corp_domain)
| extend AccountCustomEntity = SrcUserName

properties.description: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Analytics Rule 5
Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Analytics Rule 6 with template
properties.displayName: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Analytics Rule template

properties.description: DigitalGuardianFilesSentToExternalDomain_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 2.0.1
Detects bulk exfiltration to external domain.
properties.displayName: Digital Guardian - Bulk exfiltration to external domain
properties.query:
let threshold = 10;
let corp_domain = dynamic(['example.com']);
DigitalGuardianDLPEvent
| where NetworkApplicationProtocol =~ 'SMTP'
| where isnotempty(inspected_document)
| extend s_domain = extract(@'@(.*)', 1, SrcUserName)
| extend d_domain = extract(@'@(.*)', 1, DstUserName)
| where s_domain in~ (corp_domain)
| where d_domain !in (corp_domain)
| summarize f = dcount(inspected_document) by SrcUserName, DstUserName, bin(TimeGenerated, 30m)
| where  f >= threshold
| extend AccountCustomEntity = SrcUserName

properties.description: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Analytics Rule 6
Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Analytics Rule 7 with template
properties.displayName: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Analytics Rule template

properties.description: DigitalGuardianMultipleIncidentsFromUser_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 2.0.1
Detects multiple incidents from user.
properties.displayName: Digital Guardian - Multiple incidents from user
properties.query:
let threshold = 2;
DigitalGuardianDLPEvent
| where isnotempty(MatchedPolicies)
| summarize count() by SrcUserName, bin(TimeGenerated, 30m)
| where count_ >= threshold
| extend AccountCustomEntity = SrcUserName

properties.description: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Analytics Rule 7
Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Analytics Rule 8 with template
properties.displayName: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Analytics Rule template

properties.description: DigitalGuardianPossibleProtocolAbuse_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 2.0.1
Detects possible SMTP protocol abuse.
properties.displayName: Digital Guardian - Possible SMTP protocol abuse
properties.query:
DigitalGuardianDLPEvent
| where NetworkApplicationProtocol =~ 'SMTP'
| where DstPortNumber != 25
| extend AccountCustomEntity = SrcUserName

properties.description: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Analytics Rule 8
Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Analytics Rule 9 with template
properties.displayName: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Analytics Rule template

properties.description: DigitalGuardianUnexpectedProtocol_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 2.0.1
Detects RDP protocol usage for data transfer which is not common.
properties.displayName: Digital Guardian - Unexpected protocol
properties.query:
DigitalGuardianDLPEvent
| where DstPortNumber == 3389
| extend AccountCustomEntity = SrcUserName

properties.description: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Analytics Rule 9
Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Analytics Rule 10 with template
properties.displayName: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Analytics Rule template

properties.description: DigitalGuardianViolationNotBlocked_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 2.0.1
Detects when incident has not block action.
properties.displayName: Digital Guardian - Incident with not blocked action
properties.query:
DigitalGuardianDLPEvent
| where isnotempty(IncidentStatus)
| extend inc_act = split(IncidentStatus, ',')
| where inc_act has 'New'
| where inc_act !contains 'Block'
| extend AccountCustomEntity = SrcUserName

properties.description: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Analytics Rule 10
Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Hunting Query 1 with template
properties.displayName: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Hunting Query template

properties.description: DigitalGuardianDomains_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 2.0.1

properties.displayName: Digital Guardian - Incident domains
properties.query:
DigitalGuardianDLPEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where isnotempty(http_url)
| extend u = parse_url(http_url)
| extend domain=u.Host
| summarize count() by tostring(domain), SrcUserName
| extend AccountCustomEntity = SrcUserName

properties.description: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Hunting Query 1
Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Hunting Query 2 with template
properties.displayName: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Hunting Query template

properties.description: DigitalGuardianFilesSentByUsers_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 2.0.1

properties.displayName: Digital Guardian - Files sent by users
properties.query:
DigitalGuardianDLPEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where isnotempty(inspected_document)
| summarize Files = makeset(inspected_document) by SrcUserName
| extend AccountCustomEntity = SrcUserName

tags.name: description
tags.value: Query searches for files sent by users.

properties.description: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Hunting Query 2
Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Hunting Query 3 with template
properties.displayName: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Hunting Query template

properties.description: DigitalGuardianIncidentsByUser_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 2.0.1

properties.displayName: Digital Guardian - Users' incidents
properties.query:
DigitalGuardianDLPEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where isnotempty(IncidentStatus)
| where inc_act has 'New'
| summarize makeset(IncidentsUrl) by SrcUserName
| extend AccountCustomEntity = SrcUserName

properties.description: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Hunting Query 3
Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Hunting Query 4 with template
properties.displayName: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Hunting Query template

properties.description: DigitalGuardianInsecureProtocolSources_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 2.0.1

properties.displayName: Digital Guardian - Insecure file transfer sources
properties.query:
DigitalGuardianDLPEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where NetworkApplicationProtocol in~ ('HTTP', 'FTP')
| project SrcUserName, SrcIpAddr, DstIpAddr, DstPortNumber, File=inspected_document
| extend AccountCustomEntity = SrcUserName

tags.name: description
tags.value: Query searches for insecure file transfer sources.

properties.description: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Hunting Query 4
Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Hunting Query 5 with template
properties.displayName: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Hunting Query template

properties.displayName: Digital Guardian - Inspected files

DigitalGuardianDLPEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where isnotempty(inspected_document)
| project SrcUserName, DstUserName, File=inspected_document, MatchedPolicies
| extend AccountCustomEntity = SrcUserName

properties.description: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Hunting Query 5
Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Hunting Query 6 with template
properties.displayName: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Hunting Query template

properties.displayName: Digital Guardian - New incidents
properties.query:
DigitalGuardianDLPEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where isnotempty(IncidentStatus)
| extend inc_act = split(IncidentStatus, ',')
| where inc_act has 'New'
| extend AccountCustomEntity = SrcUserName

properties.description: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Hunting Query 6
Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Hunting Query 7 with template
properties.displayName: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Hunting Query template

properties.description: DigitalGuardianRareDestinationPorts_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 2.0.1

properties.displayName: Digital Guardian - Rare destination ports
properties.query:
DigitalGuardianDLPEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| summarize count() by DstIpAddr, DstPortNumber
| order by count_ asc
| top 10 by count_
| extend IPCustomEntity = DstIpAddr

tags.name: description
tags.value: Query searches for rare destination ports.

properties.description: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Hunting Query 7
Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Hunting Query 8 with template
properties.displayName: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Hunting Query template

properties.description: DigitalGuardianRareNetworkProtocols_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 2.0.1

properties.displayName: Digital Guardian - Rare network protocols
properties.query:
DigitalGuardianDLPEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where isnotempty(NetworkApplicationProtocol)
| summarize count() by SrcIpAddr, SrcUserName
| order by count_ asc
| top 10 by count_
| extend AccountCustomEntity = SrcUserName, IPCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr

properties.description: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Hunting Query 8
Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Hunting Query 9 with template
properties.displayName: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Hunting Query template

properties.description: DigitalGuardianRareUrls_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 2.0.1

properties.displayName: Digital Guardian - Rare Urls
properties.query:
DigitalGuardianDLPEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where isnotempty(http_url)
| summarize count() by SrcUserName, http_url
| order by count_ asc
| top 10 by count_
| extend AccountCustomEntity = SrcUserName

properties.description: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Hunting Query 9
Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Hunting Query 10 with template
properties.displayName: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Hunting Query template

properties.description: DigitalGuardianUrlByUser_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 2.0.1

properties.displayName: Digital Guardian - Urls used
properties.query:
DigitalGuardianDLPEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where isnotempty(http_url)
| project SrcUserName, DstUserName, URL=http_url, MatchedPolicies
| extend AccountCustomEntity = SrcUserName

properties.description: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention Hunting Query 10
DigitalGuardianDLPEvent Data Parser with template
properties.displayName: DigitalGuardianDLPEvent Data Parser template

properties.description: DigitalGuardianDLPEvent Data Parser with template version 2.0.1

properties.displayName: DigitalGuardianDLP Data Parser
properties.query:
Syslog
| where SyslogMessage contains 'managed_device_id' and SyslogMessage contains 'number_of_incidents'
| mv-apply ExtractedFields = extract_all(@'\s(?P<key>[a-zA-Z0-9-_]+)=\"?(?P<value>[a-zA-Z0-9-_:/@.,#{}>< ]+)\"?', dynamic(["key","value"]), SyslogMessage) on (
    project packed = pack(tostring(ExtractedFields[0]), tostring(ExtractedFields[1]))
    | summarize bag = make_bag(packed)
)
| evaluate bag_unpack(bag)
| extend EventEndTime=todatetime(timestamp)
| project-away timestamp
| project-rename DvcAvtion=action_taken
                , DstUserName=destination
                , DstIpAddr=destination_ip
                , DstPortNumber=destination_port
                , IncidentId=incident_id
                , IncidentStatus=incident_status
                , IncidentsUrl=incidents_url
                , MatchedPolicies=matched_policies_by_severity
                , EventCount=number_of_incidents
                , NetworkApplicationProtocol=protocol
                , SrcUserName=source
                , SrcIpAddr=source_ip
                , SrcPortNumber=source_port

properties.displayName: DigitalGuardianDLP Data Parser
properties.query:
Syslog
| where SyslogMessage contains 'managed_device_id' and SyslogMessage contains 'number_of_incidents'
| mv-apply ExtractedFields = extract_all(@'\s(?P<key>[a-zA-Z0-9-_]+)=\"?(?P<value>[a-zA-Z0-9-_:/@.,#{}>< ]+)\"?', dynamic(["key","value"]), SyslogMessage) on (
    project packed = pack(tostring(ExtractedFields[0]), tostring(ExtractedFields[1]))
    | summarize bag = make_bag(packed)
)
| evaluate bag_unpack(bag)
| extend EventEndTime=todatetime(timestamp)
| project-away timestamp
| project-rename DvcAvtion=action_taken
                , DstUserName=destination
                , DstIpAddr=destination_ip
                , DstPortNumber=destination_port
                , IncidentId=incident_id
                , IncidentStatus=incident_status
                , IncidentsUrl=incidents_url
                , MatchedPolicies=matched_policies_by_severity
                , EventCount=number_of_incidents
                , NetworkApplicationProtocol=protocol
                , SrcUserName=source
                , SrcIpAddr=source_ip
                , SrcPortNumber=source_port

properties.description: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention data connector with template
properties.displayName: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention template

properties.description: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention data connector with template version 2.0.1

connectorUiConfig.title: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: [Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention (DLP)](https://digitalguardian.com/platform-overview) data connector provides the capability to ingest Digital Guardian DLP logs into Microsoft Sentinel.
connectorUiConfig.additionalRequirementBanner: This data connector depends on a parser based on a Kusto Function to work as expected [**DigitalGuardianDLPEvent**](https://aka.ms/sentinel-DigitalGuardianDLP-parser) which is deployed with the Microsoft Sentinel Solution.

sampleQueries.query:
DigitalGuardianDLPEvent
 | where notempty(SrcIpAddr)
 | summarize count() by SrcIpAddr
 | top 10 by count_

dataTypes.name: Syslog (DigitalGuardianDLPEvent)
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
DigitalGuardianDLPEvent
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

value:
DigitalGuardianDLPEvent
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: read permissions to shared keys for the workspace are required. [See the documentation to learn more about workspace keys](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/platform/agent-windows#obtain-workspace-id-and-key)

instructionSteps.description: >**NOTE:** This data connector depends on a parser based on a Kusto Function to work as expected [**DigitalGuardianDLPEvent**](https://aka.ms/sentinel-DigitalGuardianDLP-parser) which is deployed with the Microsoft Sentinel Solution.

Follow these steps to configure Digital Guardian to forward logs via Syslog:

1.1. Log in to the Digital Guardian Management Console.

1.2. Select **Workspace** > **Data Export** > **Create Export**.

1.3. From the **Data Sources** list, select **Alerts** or **Events** as the data source.

1.4. From the **Export type** list, select **Syslog**.

1.5. From the **Type list**, select **UDP** or **TCP** as the transport protocol.

1.6. In the **Server** field, type the IP address of your Remote Syslog server.

1.7. In the **Port** field, type 514 (or other port if your Syslog server was configured to use non-default port).

1.8. From the **Severity Level** list, select a severity level.

1.9. Select the **Is Active** check box.

1.9. Click **Next**.

1.10. From the list of available fields, add Alert or Event fields for your data export.

1.11. Select a Criteria for the fields in your data export and click **Next**.

1.12. Select a group for the criteria and click **Next**.

1.13. Click **Test Query**.

1.14. Click **Next**.

1.15. Save the data export.
instructionSteps.title: 1. Configure Digital Guardian to forward logs via Syslog to remote server where you will install the agent.

instructionSteps.description:
Install the agent on the Server to which the logs will be forwarded.

> Logs on Linux or Windows servers are collected by **Linux** or **Windows** agents.

parameters.title: Choose where to install the Linux agent:

instructionSteps.title: Install agent on Azure Linux Virtual Machine
instructionSteps.description: Select the machine to install the agent on and then click **Connect**.

instructionSteps.title: Install agent on a non-Azure Linux Machine
instructionSteps.description: Download the agent on the relevant machine and follow the instructions.

instructionSteps.title: 2. Install and onboard the agent for Linux or Windows

parameters.title: Choose where to install the Windows agent:

instructionSteps.title: Install agent on Azure Windows Virtual Machine
instructionSteps.description: Select the machine to install the agent on and then click **Connect**.

instructionSteps.title: Install agent on a non-Azure Windows Machine
instructionSteps.description: Download the agent on the relevant machine and follow the instructions.

Open Log Analytics to check if the logs are received using the Syslog schema.

>**NOTE:** It may take up to 15 minutes before new logs will appear in Syslog table.
instructionSteps.title: 3. Check logs in Microsoft Sentinel

connectorUiConfig.title: Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: [Digital Guardian Data Loss Prevention (DLP)](https://digitalguardian.com/platform-overview) data connector provides the capability to ingest Digital Guardian DLP logs into Microsoft Sentinel.

dataTypes.name: Syslog (DigitalGuardianDLPEvent)
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
DigitalGuardianDLPEvent
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

value:
DigitalGuardianDLPEvent
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

sampleQueries.query:
DigitalGuardianDLPEvent
 | where notempty(SrcIpAddr)
 | summarize count() by SrcIpAddr
 | top 10 by count_

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: read permissions to shared keys for the workspace are required. [See the documentation to learn more about workspace keys](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/platform/agent-windows#obtain-workspace-id-and-key)

instructionSteps.description: >**NOTE:** This data connector depends on a parser based on a Kusto Function to work as expected [**DigitalGuardianDLPEvent**](https://aka.ms/sentinel-DigitalGuardianDLP-parser) which is deployed with the Microsoft Sentinel Solution.

Follow these steps to configure Digital Guardian to forward logs via Syslog:

1.1. Log in to the Digital Guardian Management Console.

1.2. Select **Workspace** > **Data Export** > **Create Export**.

1.3. From the **Data Sources** list, select **Alerts** or **Events** as the data source.

1.4. From the **Export type** list, select **Syslog**.

1.5. From the **Type list**, select **UDP** or **TCP** as the transport protocol.

1.6. In the **Server** field, type the IP address of your Remote Syslog server.

1.7. In the **Port** field, type 514 (or other port if your Syslog server was configured to use non-default port).

1.8. From the **Severity Level** list, select a severity level.

1.9. Select the **Is Active** check box.

1.9. Click **Next**.

1.10. From the list of available fields, add Alert or Event fields for your data export.

1.11. Select a Criteria for the fields in your data export and click **Next**.

1.12. Select a group for the criteria and click **Next**.

1.13. Click **Test Query**.

1.14. Click **Next**.

1.15. Save the data export.
instructionSteps.title: 1. Configure Digital Guardian to forward logs via Syslog to remote server where you will install the agent.

instructionSteps.description:
Install the agent on the Server to which the logs will be forwarded.

> Logs on Linux or Windows servers are collected by **Linux** or **Windows** agents.

parameters.title: Choose where to install the Linux agent:

instructionSteps.title: Install agent on Azure Linux Virtual Machine
instructionSteps.description: Select the machine to install the agent on and then click **Connect**.

instructionSteps.title: Install agent on a non-Azure Linux Machine
instructionSteps.description: Download the agent on the relevant machine and follow the instructions.

instructionSteps.title: 2. Install and onboard the agent for Linux or Windows

parameters.title: Choose where to install the Windows agent:

instructionSteps.title: Install agent on Azure Windows Virtual Machine
instructionSteps.description: Select the machine to install the agent on and then click **Connect**.

instructionSteps.title: Install agent on a non-Azure Windows Machine
instructionSteps.description: Download the agent on the relevant machine and follow the instructions.

Open Log Analytics to check if the logs are received using the Syslog schema.

>**NOTE:** It may take up to 15 minutes before new logs will appear in Syslog table.
instructionSteps.title: 3. Check logs in Microsoft Sentinel

connectorUiConfig.additionalRequirementBanner: This data connector depends on a parser based on a Kusto Function to work as expected [**DigitalGuardianDLPEvent**](https://aka.ms/sentinel-DigitalGuardianDLP-parser) which is deployed with the Microsoft Sentinel Solution.
